The image file.
The list Id.

Docs.summary:
Fuzzily match an image against one of your custom Image Lists. You can create and manage your custom image lists using this API. Returns ID and tags of matching image.

Note: Refresh Index must be run on the corresponding Image List before additions and removals are reflected in the response.

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.CognitiveServices.ContentModerator.Models.OCR OCRFileInput(class Microsoft.CognitiveServices.ContentModerator.IImageModeration operations, string language, class System.IO.Stream imageStream, valuetype System.Nullable`1<bool> cacheImage, valuetype System.Nullable`1<bool> enhanced) cil managed

<Extension()> Public Function OCRFileInput (operations As IImageModeration, language As String, imageStream As Stream, Optional cacheImage As Nullable(Of Boolean) = null, Optional enhanced As Nullable(Of Boolean) = false) As OCR

static member OCRFileInput : Microsoft.CognitiveServices.ContentModerator.IImageModeration * string * System.IO.Stream * Nullable<bool> * Nullable<bool> -> Microsoft.CognitiveServices.ContentModerator.Models.OCR

Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.
Language of the terms.
The image file.
Whether to retain the submitted image for future use; defaults to false if omitted.

When set to True, the image goes through additional processing to come with additional candidates.
image/tiff is not supported when enhanced is set to true
Note: This impacts the response time.
Docs.summary: Returns any text found in the image for the language specified. If no language is specified in input then the detection defaults to English.
